LanguageData.VA_Glitch_CatastrophicIntro: Multiple pods spike instability. Visuals tear, audio desyncs, and the colony hears echoes from nowhere.
LanguageData.VA_Glitch_CatastrophicOutcome: Sim cores thrash. Some sleepers jolt awake, others drift, and a few talk to people that are not there.
LanguageData.VA_Awakening_Flavour_Compliant: The pod UI thanks the sleeper for their service while asking them not to look behind the curtain.
LanguageData.VA_Awakening_Flavour_Panic: The world repeats two frames while the sleeper sprints in place, convinced the walls are watching.
LanguageData.VA_Awakening_Flavour_Derealisation: The horizon tiles like a cheap wallpaper; footsteps sound borrowed as the sleeper drifts through a fake sky.
LanguageData.VA_Awakening_Flavour_Violent: The HUD cracks, health bars bleed into the air, and rage spills through the seams.
LanguageData.VA_Awakening_Flavour_Pyro: Fire licks away the colour grading. For a moment, the simulation looks honest in the light.
LanguageData.VA_Letter_GlitchMajor_Body: {0} experienced a major VR glitch: {1}.\n\nLucidity and instability are spiking; watch for further anomalies.
LanguageData.VA_Letter_GlitchModerate_Body: {0} felt a sustained anomaly: {1}.\n\nInstability creeps upward; monitor the pod.
LanguageData.VA_Letter_GlitchMinor_Body: {0} caught a small flicker: {1}.\n\nKeep an eye on lucidity and instability.
